title: Hanuman Chalisa
description: Shri Hanuman Chalisa with meaning and benefits - Forty verses praising Lord Hanuman
content:
|| Jai Shree Hanuman ||

*** Doha ***

Shri-guru charan saroj raj,
Nij manu mukur sudhari |
Barnau Raghubar bimal jasu,
Jo dhayak phal chaari ||

Buddhiheen tanu jaanike,
Sumiro Pavan kumar |
Bal buddhi vidya dehu mohe,
Harhu kalesh vikar ||

*** Chaupai ***

Jai Hanuman gyan gun sagar
Jai Kapis tihun lok ujagar

Ram doot atulit bal dhama
Anjani-putra Pavan sut nama

Kavach kundal kundal
Kapi koti saman
Raghupati kahu tumhare
Bhavan tumhare naam

Tumhare bhajan Ram ko paave
Janam janam ke dukh bisraave

Ant kaal Raghubar pur jaayi
Jahan janam Hari-bhakta kahayi

Aur devta chitt na dharai
Hanumanth se hi sarve sukh karai

Sankat kate mite sab peera
Jo sumire Hanuman balbeera

Jai Jai Jai Hanuman Gosai
Kripa karahu Gurudev ki naai

Jo sat bar path kare koi
Chhutahi bandhi maha sukh hoi

Jo yah padhe Hanuman Chalisa
Hoye siddhi sakhi Gaurisa

Tulsidas sada hari chera
Keeje nath hriday maha dera
author: Tulsidas

metadata.transliteration: Jai Hanuman gyan gun sagar, Jai Kapis tihun lok ujagar
metadata.meaning: Forty verses praising Lord Hanuman's strength, wisdom, and devotion to Lord Rama
prerequisites: Can be recited by anyone regardless of age or gender
